Despite various problems,"},{"lineNumber":50984,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦ってくれたわ。現地の連中は、王様の命令だって』","translatedEnglishLine":"they fought. The locals said it was under the King's orders."},{"lineNumber":50985,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王様って……ハニーキング？","translatedEnglishLine":"The King... Hanny King?"},{"lineNumber":50986,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そういえば、お礼をしに行った時……","translatedEnglishLine":"Come to think of it, when we went to thank Rance..."},{"lineNumber":50988,"originalJapaneseLine":"『…………え？』","translatedEnglishLine":"...Huh?"},{"lineNumber":50989,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランスさ……総統閣下と、ですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance... with the Supreme Leader, you say...?"},{"lineNumber":50990,"originalJapaneseLine":"「話が合って、意気投合したって。","translatedEnglishLine":"They say they hit it off and got along know."},{"lineNumber":50992,"originalJapaneseLine":"『ハニーと、ランスが、意気投合…………？","translatedEnglishLine":"Hanny and Rance got along...?"},{"lineNumber":50993,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうせ、いやらしい話に決まってるわ』","translatedEnglishLine":"It's definitely going to be something lewd."},{"lineNumber":50994,"originalJapaneseLine":"『……確かめてみますか？』","translatedEnglishLine":"...Shall we check it out?"},{"lineNumber":50995,"originalJapaneseLine":"「放置でいいわよ、あんなやつ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just leave someone like that Zeth!"},{"lineNumber":50999,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス城――","translatedEnglishLine":"Leazas Castle—"},{"lineNumber":51000,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"...................."},{"lineNumber":51001,"originalJapaneseLine":"面白くなさそうに頬杖をついて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Ria rested her cheek on her hand, looking displeased,"},{"lineNumber":51002,"originalJapaneseLine":"リアは魔法ビジョンを眺めていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"as she watched the magical vision."},{"lineNumber":51003,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア様……あら、ゼスですか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Ria... Oh, this is Zeth, isn't it?"},{"lineNumber":51004,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ。……魔人メディウサの、真似っこよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes... it's an imitation of the demon Medusa."},{"lineNumber":51005,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジック殿、ゼスでは人気のようですね」","translatedEnglishLine":"Master Magic seems to be popular in Zeth."},{"lineNumber":51006,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アレやると、必要以上に民衆が王族と近くなるの。","translatedEnglishLine":"Doing that makes the populace feel closer to the royal family than necessary."},{"lineNumber":51007,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王族を舐める連中が必ず出るわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"There will always be some who disrespect the royals."},{"lineNumber":51008,"originalJapaneseLine":"　長期的には、マイナスになる事もある」","translatedEnglishLine":"In the long run, it can even be detrimental."},{"lineNumber":51009,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リーザスでは……恐らく、そうでしょうね。","translatedEnglishLine":"In Leazas... it will probably be the same."},{"lineNumber":51010,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リア様は、絶対不可侵でなくては」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Ria must remain absolutely inviolable."},{"lineNumber":51011,"originalJapaneseLine":"「自分が人気取りの象徴で良いと割り切れないと、","translatedEnglishLine":"If she can't accept being just a symbol for gaining popularity,"},{"lineNumber":51012,"originalJapaneseLine":"　アレはできないわよね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"she won't be able to do that..."},{"lineNumber":51013,"originalJapaneseLine":"うっすらと……リアの口元が、綻ぶ。","translatedEnglishLine":"A faint smile appeared at the corner of Ria's mouth."},{"lineNumber":51014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やるじゃない、デコちゃん……ううん、マジック。","translatedEnglishLine":"Not bad, Deco-chan... no, Magic."},{"lineNumber":51015,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく、なりふり構わなくなったのね」","translatedEnglishLine":"You've finally stopped caring about appearances."},{"lineNumber":51016,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼスが、平和になった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Zeth has become peaceful."},{"lineNumber":51017,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………困ります。ランスさん」","translatedEnglishLine":"...That would be troubling, Rance-san."},{"lineNumber":51018,"originalJapaneseLine":"眉根を寄せて、ウルザはきっぱりと言い放った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Frowning, Urza said firmly."},{"lineNumber":51019,"originalJapaneseLine":"ゼス方面の大勢が決してから、数日後。","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days after the major battle in the Zeth area was concluded."},{"lineNumber":51020,"originalJapaneseLine":"事後処理の為にゼスに留まっていたウルザの元に、","translatedEnglishLine":"To Urza, who had stayed behind in Zeth for cleanup,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どう？』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらでも確認できているわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've confirmed it over here as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン稼働率45％から60％、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Maginot Line operation rate has risen from 45% to 60%,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍も、ほぼ駆逐できたみたいね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and it seems the Demon Army has almost been wiped out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ほっ……よかった』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Phew... that's a relief.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック様が立ち上がったのと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic-sama stood up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍団の10万が最後まで戦ってくれたのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the 100,000-strong Hanny Corps fought to the very end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きかったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was a major factor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……メディウサの記録を見せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Showing Medusa's records,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲違いさせるところまでは狙い通りでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing them to turn against each other was exactly as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、途中で飽きられるかも……と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I was worried they might get bored partway through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対策を考えていたんですが、杞憂でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I considered countermeasures, but that was unnecessary after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『そうね。なんだかんだと問題もあったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. Despite various problems,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦ってくれたわ。現地の連中は、王様の命令だって』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they fought. The locals said it was under the King's orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王様って……ハニーキング？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The King... Hanny King?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、お礼をしに行った時……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, when we went to thank him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統と話はついてる、みたいな事を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed like he had some arrangement with Supreme Leader Rance...
...Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスさ……総統閣下と、ですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance... with the Supreme Leader, you say...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話が合って、意気投合したって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they hit it off and got along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼、妙に王様とかと仲良くなるの上手いわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's strangely good at befriending kings and such, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ハニーと、ランスが、意気投合…………？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanny and Rance got along...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ、いやらしい話に決まってるわ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's definitely going to be something lewd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……確かめてみますか？』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Shall we check it out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「放置でいいわよ、あんなやつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just leave someone like that alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころじゃないんだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have more important things to focus on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、ガンガンいくわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let's go full throttle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスから、魔軍を叩き出す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll drive the Demon Army out of Zeth!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白くなさそうに頬杖をついて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria rested her cheek on her hand, looking displeased,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは魔法ビジョンを眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as she watched the magical vision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様……あら、ゼスですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria... Oh, this is Zeth, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ。……魔人メディウサの、真似っこよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes... it's an imitation of the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック殿、ゼスでは人気のようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master Magic seems to be popular in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アレやると、必要以上に民衆が王族と近くなるの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing that makes the populace feel closer to the royal family than necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王族を舐める連中が必ず出るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will always be some who disrespect the royals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長期的には、マイナスになる事もある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the long run, it can even be detrimental.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスでは……恐らく、そうでしょうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Leazas... it will probably be the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様は、絶対不可侵でなくては」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria must remain absolutely inviolable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分が人気取りの象徴で良いと割り切れないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she can't accept being just a symbol for gaining popularity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレはできないわよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she won't be able to do that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっすらと……リアの口元が、綻ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A faint smile appeared at the corner of Ria's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やるじゃない、デコちゃん……ううん、マジック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad, Deco-chan... no, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく、なりふり構わなくなったのね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've finally stopped caring about appearances.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが、平和になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth has become peaceful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………困ります。ランスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That would be troubling, Rance-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眉根を寄せて、ウルザはきっぱりと言い放った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Frowning, Urza said firmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面の大勢が決してから、数日後。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days after the major battle in the Zeth area was concluded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事後処理の為にゼスに留まっていたウルザの元に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Urza, who had stayed behind in Zeth for cleanup,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こちらでも確認できているわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We've confirmed it over here as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マジノライン稼働率45％から60％、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Maginot Line operation rate has risen from 45% to 60%,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍も、ほぼ駆逐できたみたいね」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ほっ……よかった』

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック様が立ち上がったのと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Magic-sama stood up,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハニー軍団の10万が最後まで戦ってくれたのが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the 100,000-strong Hanny Corps fought to the very end,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大きかったですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that was a major factor.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……メディウサの記録を見せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Showing Medusa's records,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 仲違いさせるところまでは狙い通りでした」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: causing them to turn against each other was exactly as planned.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただ、途中で飽きられるかも……と、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, I was worried they might get bored partway through...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対策を考えていたんですが、杞憂でしたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I considered countermeasures, but that was unnecessary after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『そうね。なんだかんだと問題もあったけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. Despite various problems,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦ってくれたわ。現地の連中は、王様の命令だって』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they fought. The locals said it was under the King's orders.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「王様って……ハニーキング？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The King... Hanny King?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういえば、お礼をしに行った時……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come to think of it, when we went to thank him...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス総統と話はついてる、みたいな事を……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it seemed like he had some arrangement with Supreme Leader Rance...
...Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランスさ……総統閣下と、ですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance... with the Supreme Leader, you say...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「話が合って、意気投合したって。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they hit it off and got along well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼、妙に王様とかと仲良くなるの上手いわよね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He's strangely good at befriending kings and such, you know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『ハニーと、ランスが、意気投合…………？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hanny and Rance got along...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうせ、いやらしい話に決まってるわ』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's definitely going to be something lewd.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 『……確かめてみますか？』
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Shall we check it out?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「放置でいいわよ、あんなやつ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just leave someone like that alone.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それどころじゃないんだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have more important things to focus on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、ガンガンいくわよ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now, let's go full throttle!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスから、魔軍を叩き出す！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We'll drive the Demon Army out of Zeth!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leazas Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 面白くなさそうに頬杖をついて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ria rested her cheek on her hand, looking displeased,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リアは魔法ビジョンを眺めていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as she watched the magical vision.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リア様……あら、ゼスですか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria... Oh, this is Zeth, isn't it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ。……魔人メディウサの、真似っこよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes... it's an imitation of the demon Medusa.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジック殿、ゼスでは人気のようですね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master Magic seems to be popular in Zeth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アレやると、必要以上に民衆が王族と近くなるの。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Doing that makes the populace feel closer to the royal family than necessary.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王族を舐める連中が必ず出るわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There will always be some who disrespect the royals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 長期的には、マイナスになる事もある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the long run, it can even be detrimental.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスでは……恐らく、そうでしょうね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Leazas... it will probably be the same.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リア様は、絶対不可侵でなくては」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Ria must remain absolutely inviolable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「自分が人気取りの象徴で良いと割り切れないと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If she can't accept being just a symbol for gaining popularity,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アレはできないわよね……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she won't be able to do that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うっすらと……リアの口元が、綻ぶ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A faint smile appeared at the corner of Ria's mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やるじゃない、デコちゃん……ううん、マジック。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not bad, Deco-chan... no, Magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく、なりふり構わなくなったのね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You've finally stopped caring about appearances.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼスが、平和になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Zeth has become peaceful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「…………困ります。ランスさん」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...That would be troubling, Rance-san.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 眉根を寄せて、ウルザはきっぱりと言い放った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Frowning, Urza said firmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゼス方面の大勢が決してから、数日後。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days after the major battle in the Zeth area was concluded.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 事後処理の為にゼスに留まっていたウルザの元に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To Urza, who had stayed behind in Zeth for cleanup,
